articles.title: 'Gypsy girl', 18, marries cousin in massive ceremony that features 73 best men - Daily Mail
articles.description: Chantelle Kielly, 18, who lives in Rathkeale, wore a dress adorned with 20,000 crystals as she married her first cousin Jim on an episode of Channel 4's  Big Fat Gypsy Wedding
articles.content:
